CustomField.formula: IF ( CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 0, NULL, IF ( OR(CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 1, CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 2), IMAGE('/resource/CS_1_4', "1/4",18,18), IF ( CRM_CrossSellingABI__c > 10, IMAGE('/resource/CS_4_4', "4/4",18,18), IF ( OR ( TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = 'Assente', TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = 'Residuale', TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = 'Non portafogliati', TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = NULL, TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = 'Controparti Istituzionali', TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = 'Consulenti Finanziari', TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = 'Enti e Tesorerie', TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = 'POE' ), IF ( OR (CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 1, CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 2), IMAGE('/resource/CS_1_4', "1/4",18,18), IF ( OR (CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 3, CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 4), IMAGE('/resource/CS_2_4', "2/4",18,18), IF ( OR (CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 5, CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 6), IMAGE('/resource/CS_3_4', "3/4",18,18), IF ( CRM_CrossSellingABI__c > 6, IMAGE('/resource/CS_4_4', "4/4",18,18), NULL ) ) ) ), IF ( TEXT(CRM_Account__r.ModelloDiServizio__c) = 'Family', IF ( OR (CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 3, CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 4), IMAGE('/resource/CS_2_4', "2/4",18,18), IF ( OR (CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 5, CRM_CrossSellingABI__c = 6), IMAGE('/resource/CS_3_4', "3/4",18,18), IF ( AND (CRM_CrossSellingABI__c >= 7, CRM_CrossSellingABI__c <= 10), IMAGE('/resource/CS_4_4', "4/4",18,18), NULL ) ) ), NULL ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Formula icona percentuale CS - parte 1
